attributes.action: introduce a fine system for cat owners who allow their cats to foul neighbours land.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dog fouling which is not cleared on streets carries a fine, this helps deter this and many owners now use pooper scoopers. Cats however are allowed to roam free and foul many gardens creating a considerable health risk.

I propose a fine system similar to that for dog owners if a particular cat can be proven to be fouling your property.

I would not get away with bringing a dog to your garden every night for its business so why should a cat owner?
